articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: SoftBank's Arm valued at nearly $60 bln in stellar Nasdaq debut - The Economic Times
articles.description: Its stock opened at $56.1 per American Depositary Share compared with the initial public offering (IPO) price of $51, in a sign of confidence for other companies planning to list
articles.content: SoftBank's Arm Holdings was valued at nearly $60 billion in a strong Nasdaq debut on Thursday, as the shares of the chip designer surged 10% above their offer price.Its stock opened at $56.1 per Amer… [+4317 chars]
